title: Insecure FTP Server
description: Your task is to exploit an FTP server misconfiguration to retrieve a sensitive file.
hints: Anonymous access might give you more than expected.
Check the files available in the FTP root directory.
Use common FTP client commands to download the flag.
learningObjectives: Understand the implications of allowing anonymous FTP access.
Learn to identify potentially dangerous FTP server settings.
Practice using FTP client tools for penetration testing.
